contentrichtext.text: {{no footnotes|date=January 2013}} '''Xavier Dupré''' is a [[typeface]] designer born in [[Aubenas]] (Ardèche), France in 1977. Dupré is notable for the recognition he has received for his typeface designs in the 2000s. According to several similar online biographies Dupré studied [[graphic design]] and applied arts in [[Paris]]. He also studied [[calligraphy]] and [[typography]] at the Scriptorium de Toulouse [[:fr:Scriptorium de Toulouse]]. Dupré lived in [[Cambodia]] from 2001 to 2004 where he designed Latin typefaces (i.e. fonts used for western European languages) as well as [[Khmer language|Khmer]] typefaces. While Dupré has been a prolific designer since about 2001, three of his typefaces have earned special distinction by the [[Type Directors Club]]: FF Angkoon in 2004 [http://tdc.org/news/2004Results/Angkoon.html], FF Absara in 2005 [http://tdc.org/news/2005Results/Absara.html] and Vista Sans in 2006 [http://tdc.org/news/2006Results/Vista.html]. More recently, in 2008, Malaga was selected as a "Favorite" of 2007 by online Typographica.org. [http://new.typographica.org/2008/features/our-favorite-typefaces-of-2007/#index] Other typefaces designed by Dupré include FF Parango, 2001 [http://www.fontfont.com/fonts/parango], FF Reminga, 2001 [http://www.fontshop.com/search/?q=reminga], FF Tartine Script, 2002 [http://www.fontshop.com/search/?q=tartine], FF Jambono, 2002 [http://www.fontshop.com/search/?q=jambono], FF Absara Sans, 2005 [http://www.fontshop.com/search/?q=absara%20sans], Zingha, 2005 [http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Zingha], FF Megano, 2005 [http://www.fontfont.com/fonts/megano], FF Sanuk, 2006 [http://www.fontfont.com/fonts/sanuk], Vista Slab, 2009 [http://new.typographica.org/2009/typeface-reviews/vista-slab/], FF Masala, 2009 [http://www.fontfont.com/fonts/masala], FF Masala Script, 2009 [http://www.fontfont.com/fonts/masala-script], FF Yoga, 2009 [http://www.fontfont.com/fonts/yoga], and FF Yoga Sans, 2009 [http://www.fontfont.com/fonts/yoga-sans]. ==External links== * [http://xavierdupre.com/ Personal website] * [http://www.fontfont.com/designers/xavier-dupré Biography and overview of his typefaces] (FontFont.com) {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]] --> | NAME =Dupre, Xavier | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 1977 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Dupre, Xavier}} [[Category:French typographers]] [[Category:1977 births]] [[Category:Living people]] {{France-artist-stub}} {{designer-stub}}
